Text:
Thanks for doing the work of capturing the show, taking out the commercials and then sharing what you've done with the rest of us.
EVEN the ones that delete the torrent the instant they've got the full download. I still have aq hard time figuring out how to edit the ads out, convert to a smaller format and STILL have the thing be watchable.
Cheers and thanks for your efforts on our behalf

I concur with rgregb,
Thanks so much for the awesome uploads.
Your hard work editing and uploading is much appreciated
